general.byline: dep. CTO@OneDome.com in London, UK, He
general.about: Leveraging a decade of experience in cloud and web technologies to drive innovation as a Deputy CTO at OneDome.com

writing.heading: To Be Effective at Programming, Doesnâ€™t Necessarily Mean You Have to Keep Writing Code, Medium.com
writing.title: To Be Effective at Programming, Doesnâ€™t Necessarily Mean You Have to Keep Writing Code

workExperience.heading: dep. CTO at OneDome.com
workExperience.description:
Onedome.com - is a technology company revolutionizing home moving in the UK.

Programming Languages: Java, Go, Javascript

Tech Stack:
- Java Spring 
- AWS DynamoDB, EC2, Lambda, S3,  SES, SNS, RDS, ELV, ECS, ECC
- ElasticSearch 
- Terraform
- Docker 
- Google Cloud Firebase,  Firestore
workExperience.title: dep. CTO

workExperience.heading: Co-founder at One Easy Solution
workExperience.description:
EasyRestaurant is an innovative B2B, PAAS software solution of the OES that is dedicated to automating restaurant management operations. It enables online ordering for restaurants and aggregates multiple food delivery platforms (UberEats, Grubhub, etc) accounts in one dashboard.
- Cut technical costs of the company by 40% by planning a scalable, cloud architecture with a cost-efficient approach 
- Centralized order management by aggregating all orders from the multiple food delivery service accounts of restaurants by reverse-engineering them
workExperience.title: Co-founder

workExperience.heading: Tech Lead at BookSpaHotel.com
workExperience.description:
BookSpaHotel.com is an online hotel booking service specialized in bringing elderly tourists with various diseases from post-USSR countries into more than 350 European spa-hotel complexes. 
- Created a booking search engine and an instant hotel availability check by integrating more than 350 hotels. While doing it talking to the people in senior technical roles from all businesses as part of my daily routine. 
- Increased speed of the sales team by 10 times by automating price management based on competitorsâ€™ price changes via reverse-engineering to get competitive prices from their websites. 
- Created a cost-efficient server infrastructure by designing a cloud microservice architecture
workExperience.title: Tech Lead

workExperience.heading: Software Engineer at DSG Iletisim
workExperience.description:
hediyesepeti.com is one of the top Turkish e-commerce platforms focused on the gifting market.
 - Decreased technical costs by 2 times by re-structuring the platform from a monolith to a microservice, cloud architecture
 - Increased traffic to the website by 40% by instantly generating photo-realistic previews of the items based on user inputs.
workExperience.title: Software Engineer

workExperience.heading: Software Engineer at Baku State University
workExperience.description:
Baku State University is one of the leading universities in Azerbaijan.
- Achieved 10 times faster page load by re-constructing the main website - bsu.edu.az
- Built an electronic scientific document database of the university available for the students
- Minimalized human factor by re-structuring in-place controlled computer-based exam auditoriums of the university to remote management
workExperience.title: Software Engineer

education.heading: Bachelor's Degrees in Applied Mathematics at Baku State University
Bachelor's Degrees in Applied Mathematics at Moscow State University
